text: Castelsardo (Calthèddu, CastèdduSardu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 5,954 people lived there. It has an area of 43.34 km². It is located at 114 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Castelsardo
